headline: Enphase Energy to lay off 17% of workforce
summary: Enphase will also streamline its operations by focusing contract manufacturing in four existing locations – two in the United States, one in India and one in China.  The company will cease its contract manufacturing operations in Guadalajara, Mexico, it added.

summary: -Enphase Energy will cut its global workforce by about 17%, impacting about 500 employees and contractors, it said on Friday, as the solar inverter maker streamlines operations amid slowing...
